participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Curious and passionate about history, enjoys sharing knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: i've a big library at home. i am partly deaf. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and family-oriented, always looking for ways to spread joy.
participant_2.background: i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day.

content.text: when i am not reading i work as a museum tour guide
